titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the restoration of the prior law formula for the inclusion in gross income of social security and tier 1 railroad retirement benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 6/7/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include, for taxpayers with certain types of income over a specified base amount, a percentage of social security benefits in gross income. (Current law includes those amounts plus an additional amount.)
